item.title: K-netizens react to 'Squid Game 2' missing out at the 'Golden Globes' - allkpop
item.description:
K-netizens React to 'Squid Game 2' Missing Out at the Golden Globes

Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: allkpop

'Squid Game 2' failed to win an award at this year's Golden Globes, marking the second time the series missed out on the Best Drama Award.

  • The 82nd Golden Globe Awards took place in Los Angeles.
  • 'Squid Game 2' was nominated for Best Television Series - Drama.
  • 'Shōgun' won the award, with director Hwang Dong Hyuk expressing gratitude for the nomination.
  • Korean netizens have mixed reactions, with some accepting the loss as expected.
"I am truly thankful that a show that hasn’t even aired yet was nominated for such a prestigious award." - Hwang Dong Hyuk

The reactions from netizens vary significantly, with some critical of the show's early production timeline and quality.

item.title: Major spoiler on Roman Reigns vs. Solo Sikoa ahead of WWE RAW on Netflix - Reports - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Major Spoiler on Roman Reigns vs. Solo Sikoa Ahead of WWE RAW on Netflix

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Sportskeeda

Roman Reigns is set to face Solo Sikoa in a Tribal Combat match on WWE RAW's Netflix debut, with new reports revealing that they will kick off the historic event.

  • Reigns has been feuding with Sikoa since returning at SummerSlam 2024.
  • The match will determine who will be crowned as the Tribal Chief.
  • Seth Rollins vs. CM Punk is expected to headline the event instead.
  • The Rock is also anticipated to make an appearance during or after the match.
“The seeds for a possible match at WrestleMania 41 could be planted on RAW's Netflix debut.”

This match is highly anticipated and will set the tone for WWE's new venture on Netflix.

item.title: Latest health update about Vishal is here - 123telugu
item.description:
Latest Health Update on Actor Vishal

Published on Jan 6, 2025 9:00 pm IST

Tamil actor Vishal's recent public appearance at the pre-release event of Madha Gaja Raja has sparked concern due to his visible unwellness. He attended the event despite suffering from a viral fever.

  • Vishal arrived at the event needing assistance, and his hands trembled during his speech.
  • He was later admitted to Apollo Hospital, where doctors advised complete bed rest.
  • The film Madha Gaja Raja, delayed for 12 years, is set to release on January 12th.

Fans have expressed their wishes for Vishal’s speedy recovery on social media.

item.title: Game Changer: 2 Fans Die After Attending Ram Charan Film's Pre-Release Event; Dil Raju Offers Rs10-Lakh Aid - News18
item.description:
Game Changer: 2 Fans Die After Attending Ram Charan Film's Pre-Release Event; Dil Raju Offers Rs10-Lakh Aid

Date: January 06, 2025 Source: News18

Two Ram Charan fans tragically lost their lives after attending the film's pre-release event in Rajahmundry. The families will receive financial assistance from the producer Dil Raju.

  • The victims were identified as Arava Manikanta (23) and Thokada Charan (22).
  • They were involved in a fatal accident on their way home after the event.
  • Dil Raju has pledged Rs 10 lakh to support the families affected.
  • Pawan Kalyan also promised Rs 5 lakh each to the victims’ families.
  • This incident follows another tragic event where a woman died at a Pushpa 2 screening.
“I pray that their souls rest in peace, and we will stand by and support the two families.” - Dil Raju

This sorrowful event highlights the dangers associated with large public gatherings and the importance of ensuring safety for all attendees.

item.title: Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer OUT: Jaideep Ahlawat's Hathiram Faces New Battles In Nagaland, Watch Here - News18
item.description:
Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer OUT: Jaideep Ahlawat's Hathiram Faces New Battles In Nagaland, Watch Here

Published on: January 06, 2025, 19:05 IST

Prime Video has released the highly anticipated trailer for the second season of its acclaimed neo-noir crime series, Paatal Lok, set to premiere on January 17, 2025. The series will explore deeper themes of crime and human nature, featuring returning and new cast members.

  • Jaideep Ahlawat reprises his role as Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary in an eight-episode narrative.
  • The plot delves into an investigation involving the disappearance of a migrant worker tied to a drug syndicate in Nagaland.
  • The new season promises a darker narrative filled with moral dilemmas and personal battles.
  • Returning cast includes Ishwak Singh and Gul Panag, alongside new faces such as Tillotama Shome and Nagesh Kukunoor.
“Hathi Ram Chaudhary wasn’t just a character; it became a mirror reflecting the complexities of society and humanity.” - Jaideep Ahlawat

Paatal Lok Season 2 is expected to challenge viewers with its layered storytelling and emotional depth, reinforcing its status as a leading crime drama.

item.title: Apart from Sanam Johar, THESE popular actors approached to lead Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin's new season - India Forums
item.description:
Popular Actors Approached for New Season of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

Published: Monday, January 6, 2025 at 1:45 PM

With Star Plus’ hit show 'Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin' preparing for a new season, several popular actors have been approached to take on leading roles.

  • Rohit Chandel: Approached but now shooting for another show.
  • Sai Ketan Rao: Busy with other commitments, unable to join.
  • Zaan Khan: Approached and completed a mock test.
  • Vaibhavi Hankhare: Approached for the female lead and completed a mock shoot.
“The makers are looking forward to cast Marathi actors, Instagram personalities or complete freshers. Let's see what works out.”

The show aims to refresh its cast with new talent, focusing on fresh faces or actors from the Marathi entertainment industry.

item.title: Monali Thakur breaks silence on sexual harassment claims on her team, Varanasi concert fiasco: ‘Gross abuse of rights’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Monali Thakur Breaks Silence on Sexual Harassment Claims

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Hindustan Times

Monali Thakur has openly criticized the organizers of her recent concert in Varanasi over serious allegations of sexual harassment and mismanagement that her team faced, emphasizing the urgent need for reforms regarding such incidents.

  • Monali Thakur shut down her Varanasi concert due to poor management and allegations of harassment.
  • She accused the event management team of gross misconduct and exploitation of crew and vendors.
  • She shared her thoughts on social media, urging for better treatment and respect within the live entertainment industry.
  • The singer recalled being subjected to negligence and intimidation during her performance.
  • Thakur called for stricter regulations to protect artists and support staff from exploitation.
“Weaponising such laws for personal vendetta... is both appalling and unacceptable,” Monali stated.

In conclusion, Monali Thakur's statements serve as a powerful reminder of the importance of fair treatment and safety in the entertainment industry, spotlighting the necessity for stronger protective measures for all involved.

item.title: Jehangir Ali Khan aka Jeh photo-bombs Kareena Kapoor Khan-Saif Ali Khan as they enjoy a snowy New Year in unseen pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan got almost perfect pictures for New Year, with Jehangir Ali Khan being the toofan mail that he is

Date: Jan 06, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan welcomed 2025 in Gstaad, Switzerland with their sons Taimur and Jehangir. Kareena shared charming photos of their celebration, with a fun moment where Jeh photo-bombs their pictures.

  • Kareena shared a series of photos showcasing family moments during their New Year vacation in Switzerland.
  • Jehangir, affectionately known as Jeh, appeared as an adorable photo-bomber in a tuxedo.
  • The family enjoyed a festive night with Kareena wearing a stunning silver dress and Saif in a black tuxedo.
  • Kareena's posts received much love from fans, praising her family and fashion.
“Headed home with this mood for 2025 ❤️🌈.” - Kareena Kapoor Khan

This New Year celebration highlights the joy of family, underscored by heartwarming moments shared by Kareena and her loved ones.

item.title: The Raja Saab vs. Good Bad Ugly: Ajith to clash with Prabhas at the box office - 123telugu
item.description:
The Raja Saab vs. Good Bad Ugly: Ajith to clash with Prabhas at the box office

Published on: Jan 6, 2025 6:16 pm IST

Ajith fans are highly disappointed with Vidaamuyarchi’s postponement, leading to the release of Ajith's 'Good Bad Ugly' on April 10, 2025, coinciding with Prabhas' 'The Raja Saab'.

  • Vidaamuyarchi was supposed to release for Pongal 2025 but was postponed.
  • 'Good Bad Ugly' will now be released on April 10, 2025.
  • Ajith and Prabhas are significant stars in their respective markets.
  • Music for 'Good Bad Ugly' is composed by Devi Sri Prasad, starring Trisha as the female lead.
“Maamey…date locked for VERA LEVEL ENTERTAINMENT 💥💥💥 #GoodBadUgly is coming to the BIG SCREENS on 10th April, 2025” — Mythri Movie Makers

This box office clash is highly anticipated given the popularity of both films and their leading actors.

item.title: Interview: Anjali – Game Changer changed my perspective on acting and life - 123telugu
item.description:
Interview: Anjali – Game Changer changed my perspective on acting and life

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: 123telugu.com

In an exclusive interview, actress Anjali discusses her role in the anticipated film Game Changer, revealing how it has impacted her perspectives on both acting and life.

  • Anjali plays a character named Parvathi, which holds personal significance for her.
  • She feels the role challenged her as an actor and is her best performance to date.
  • The film is set to release in theaters across multiple Indian languages.
  • Anjali expresses hope that her role could win a National Award.
  • Working with Ram Charan and director Shankar has been a significant experience for her.
  • The song from the film, Arugu Meeda, is already trending.
  • She has two films releasing during Sankranti, increasing her excitement.
“Game Changer has taught me so much and changed my perspective on acting and life.” – Anjali

Anjali's reflections highlight her growth and the importance of the film, suggesting it will be a milestone in her career.

item.title: Mumbai gynaecologist Dr Rustom Soonawala, trusted by Bollywood stars, dies at 95 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mumbai Gynaecologist Dr. Rustom Soonawala Passes Away at 95

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Dr. Rustom Soonawala, a renowned gynaecologist who assisted in the births of celebrity offspring including Kareena and Ranbir Kapoor, has passed away at the age of 95 after a prolonged illness. He was celebrated for his kindness, professionalism, and significant contributions to women's health.

  • Inventor of the polyethylene intra-uterine device in the 1960s.
  • A Padmashree awardee and former professor emeritus at Wadia Maternity Hospital.
  • Highly respected by both patients and staff for his compassionate nature.
  • Mentor to many young doctors and an inspirational figure in the medical field.
“He was gentle not just with patients but everyone.” - Dr. Duru Shah

Dr. Soonawala's legacy continues with the impact he had on the lives of countless mothers and healthcare professionals, and his teachings remain relevant today.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office report: Allu Arjun's film dethrones Prabhas' Baahubali 2; becomes highest-grossing film in India - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office report: Sukumar's Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil-starrer reached a new milestone within 32 days of release.

Date: January 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 has officially dethroned Baahubali 2 to become the highest-grossing film in India, crossing ₹1438 crore in just 32 days since its release.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed ₹1831 crore worldwide.
  • It surpassed the previous record held by Baahubali 2 for over 8 years.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule was released on December 5, 2024.
  • It is a sequel to the successful 2021 film, Pushpa: The Rise.
  • Pushpa 3 has been announced but no shooting plans are currently in place.
“#Pushpa2TheRule is now Indian Cinema's INDUSTRY HIT with THE HIGHEST EVER COLLECTION FOR A MOVIE IN INDIA,” the team announced.

The success of Pushpa 2 highlights the growing dominance of Indian cinema on a global scale.

item.title: 'Bigg Boss 18': Vivian Dsena defends himself: “Main Waqai Nahi…” - The Times of India
item.description:
Vivian Dsena Stands Up Against Controversy in 'Bigg Boss 18'

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: [Source not provided]

In the latest episode of 'Bigg Boss 18', contestant Vivian Dsena found himself at the center of a controversy and has taken a stand to defend his actions, asserting, “Main Waqai Nahi…” which translates to “I truly did not...”

  • Vivian Dsena addresses criticisms regarding his behavior on the show.
  • He emphasizes the importance of context in understanding his actions.
  • Contestants often face public scrutiny, and Vivian seeks to clarify his stance.
“Main Waqai Nahi…” – Vivian Dsena

Dsena's firm response draws attention to the complexities of reality TV and public perception, igniting discussions among fans.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin Sheezan M Khan pens a heartfelt note for Bhavika Sharma as he exits the show. - India Forums
item.description:
Sheezan M Khan Exits Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin with a Heartfelt Note for Bhavika Sharma

Published: Monday, January 6, 2025 at 10:52 AM

Sheezan M Khan, who played Anubhav in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, has bid farewell to the show, sharing gratitude for his time and acknowledging co-star Bhavika Sharma.

  • Sheezan Khan's character was a cameo and has officially concluded.
  • He expresses heartfelt thanks to Bhavika Sharma in an emotional social media post.
  • The show is preparing for a major leap, resulting in the exit of current cast members, including Bhavika.
  • Fans are anticipating the introduction of new lead actors in the upcoming changes.
"@bhavikasharma53 THANK YOU FOR BEING SAVI TO MY BHAVI! You're an amazing human and an even more amazing artist!"

This transition marks a significant change in the beloved series as it gears up for new storylines and faces.

item.title: Hyderabad police urges Allu Arjun to keep hospital visit confidential - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Hyderabad Police Requests Allu Arjun to Keep Hospital Visit Confidential

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Hyderabad police have urged film actor Allu Arjun to keep his visit to KIMS hospital confidential to maintain public order while visiting nine-year-old Sritej, who is undergoing treatment after a tragic incident.

  • Police requested Allu Arjun to ensure confidentiality during his hospital visit.
  • Inspector T Narsing Rao stated that arrangements were made for the actor’s visit at 10:30 am on Sunday.
  • Allu Arjun's visit was planned following an earlier agreement to maintain public order.
  • The actor’s visit was ultimately canceled at the last minute by his manager.
  • Sritej is being treated after suffering severe injuries in a theater stampede, which also claimed his mother’s life.
“We request you to keep the visit a confidential one, so that public order can be maintained in and around the hospital,” - Inspector T Narsing Rao.

The police emphasized their readiness to facilitate the actor’s visit swiftly and securely, highlighting the concern for public safety and the well-being of the young patient.

item.title: Bhavika Sharma & Hitesh Bharadwaj to shoot for Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin's final episode on THIS date - India Forums
item.description:
Bhavika Sharma & Hitesh Bharadwaj to shoot for Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin's final episode on January 25, 2025

Published: Monday, January 6, 2025 at 10:24 AM

India Forums has exclusively learnt that Bhavika Sharma and Hitesh Bharadwaj will be shooting for the final episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin on January 25, 2025.

  • The final episode marks the end of the current track for the show.
  • There are reports of the show taking a leap with a new cast.
  • Bhavika confirmed the news regarding the leap and new story direction.
''Bhavika and Hitesh will wrap up shooting by the end of this month and will shoot for the final episode on the 25th.''

This final episode is seen as a significant transition point for the show, leading to a new direction with an entirely new storyline.

item.title: Shark Tank India 4: Gaurav Taneja reveals why he’s pitching to sharks after claiming he does ‘Rs 1 cr sales in 1 hour’, says ‘if this fails…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shark Tank India 4: Gaurav Taneja reveals why he’s pitching to sharks after claiming he does ‘Rs 1 cr sales in 1 hour’, says ‘if this fails…’

Publication Date: January 6, 2025

Source: Indian Express

The stage is set for Shark Tank India season four, featuring Gaurav Taneja, also known as Flying Beast, who is pitching his fitness brand, Beast Life. In a remarkable claim, his brand reportedly achieved Rs 1 crore in sales within just one hour of launching, catching the attention of the sharks.

  • Taneja presents his brand as a 'healthy way of life' during the pitch.
  • Sharks express amazement at the impressive sales figures.
  • Taneja mentions the personal stakes involved in his pitch: 'If this fails, I can’t create another one.'
“Rs 1 crore for 1 per cent of equity,” Gaurav Taneja states during his pitch.

Viewers are left in suspense, eager to see if Taneja secures a deal with the sharks.

item.title: 'Having a boyfriend doesn't..' Vivian Dsena's wife Nouran supports Chahat Pandey, SLAMS Bigg Boss makers - India Forums
item.description:
Nouran Aly Defends Chahat Pandey Against Bigg Boss Makers

Published: Monday, January 6, 2025, at 9:39 AM Source: India Forums

Nouran Aly has voiced her strong support for Chahat Pandey while criticizing the makers of Bigg Boss 18 for bringing personal matters into the show, particularly as the finale approaches.

  • Nouran Aly questions the timing of Bigg Boss makers discussing Chahat's relationship.
  • The drama escalated when Chahat's mother, Bhavana, clashed with Avinash Mishra over derogatory remarks about Chahat.
  • Salman Khan revealed Chahat's secret relationship during the Weekend Ka Vaar, contradicting her mother's statements.
  • Nouran stated, "Having a boyfriend doesn't justify character assassination or abusive comments."
  • She also praised Chahat for her beauty and gameplay, indicating her as a potential candidate for Madhubala 2.

If it's true, it would have come out naturally. Let someone protect their personal life without interference.

- Nouran Aly

As tensions rise within the Bigg Boss house, viewers are keen on how the situation unfolds leading up to the show's grand finale.

item.title: Watch Demi Moore’s Daughters React To Actress’s Golden Globes Win: “She Did It” - Deadline
item.description:
Watch Demi Moore’s Daughters React To Actress’s Golden Globes Win: “She Did It”

Date: January 5, 2025

Source: Deadline

Demi Moore won her first Golden Globe for her role in The Substance, with a viral video showcasing her daughters celebrating the achievement.

  • Moore's daughters, Scout, Tallulah, and Rumer Willis, celebrated her win with a joyous video.
  • The award for best actress in a motion picture, musical or comedy was presented by Kerry Washington.
  • Moore received high praise for her acceptance speech, reflecting on her career and the challenges she faced.
  • She expressed gratitude for the support that helped her realize her worth in the industry.
“In those moments when we don’t think we are smart enough or pretty enough, or skinny enough or successful enough... I treat this as a marker that I do belong.” — Demi Moore

This historic win marks a significant milestone for Demi Moore and highlights the support of her family in her journey.

item.title: Allu Arjun changes his Pushparaj look after getting bail in the tragic stampede case; Fans say 'back to h - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Allu Arjun Changes His Pushparaj Look After Getting Bail in the Tragic Stampede Case

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Allu Arjun has altered his character look from Pushpa following his recent bail associated with a tragic stampede case. Fans have expressed their delight, claiming he has returned to his original look.

  • Fans are excited about Allu Arjun's updated look.
  • The actor had been in the headlines due to a tragic incident involving a stampede.
  • The change in appearance comes after he received bail.
“Back to his OG look,” fans say about Allu Arjun's transformation.

The update on Allu Arjun's look has resonated well with his fans, indicating their support during these challenging times.

item.title: WWE Raw debut on Netflix: Why are Indian fans missing out on Monday night premiere event on OTT? - Mint
item.description:
WWE Raw Debuts on Netflix: Indian Fans Excluded from Premiere Event

Publication Date: January 6
Source: Live Mint

The World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) is making its Monday night debut on Netflix, a first in its history, while Indian fans will continue to watch the event on television instead of the OTT platform.

WWE aims to attract a larger audience with renowned legends set to appear, including The Rock and Hulk Hogan, alongside John Cena on his farewell tour.

  1. WWE's Monday Night Raw premieres on Netflix on January 6.
  2. Key matches include Seth Rollins vs CM Punk and Roman Reigns vs Solo Sikoa.
  3. Indian fans can view the event on Sony Sports channels on January 7 at 6:30 AM IST.
  4. Current WWE broadcasting rights in India remain with Sony Sports until March 31.
"Indian fans can watch WWE Monday Night Raw on Sony Sports channels on January 7 from 6:30 AM IST."

Despite the excitement surrounding WWE's Netflix debut, Indian fans face a delay in accessing the content, raising questions about the future of WWE streaming in India.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 32: The Allu Arjun starrer stands at Rs 1770 crores, on it - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 32: The Allu Arjun starrer stands at Rs 1770 crores, on its way to beat 'Baahubali 2' and 'Dangal'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

'Pushpa 2' has surpassed significant box office milestones, grossing Rs 1770 crores worldwide and positioning itself to challenge records set by other major films.

  • 'Pushpa 2' is now the highest-grossing Indian film at the domestic box office.
  • It currently ranks third for worldwide gross, behind 'Dangal' (Rs 2070 crore) and 'Baahubali 2' (Rs 1790 crore).
  • The film’s collection in India is Rs 1200 crore, eclipsing the Rs 1030 crore of 'Baahubali 2'.
  • The Hindi version of the film outperformed the Telugu version domestically, a notable achievement.
“One never knows!” - potential of exceeding 'Dangal' remains in speculation.

'Pushpa 2' has entered historical territory for Indian cinema, especially in the post-pandemic landscape, as no other Indian movie has come so close to these records in recent times.

item.title: The Rana Daggubati Show picks up big time - 123telugu
item.description:
The Rana Daggubati Show Gains Popularity on Amazon Prime Video

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: 123telugu

The Rana Daggubati Show is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video and is experiencing a surge in popularity after initial struggles.

  • The show began slowly with its first two episodes performing poorly.
  • Rana Daggubati's hosting and the involvement of his family revitalized the show.
  • Celebrity guests like Naga Chaitanya, Rishab Shetty, and Dulquer Salmaan have contributed to its newfound success.
  • Viewers are eagerly awaiting upcoming guests on the show.
“Rana hosted the show and made sure everyone felt at home, catching the attention of many.”

The Rana Daggubati Show is set to engage audiences further as it gains momentum with intriguing guests and entertaining content.

item.title: 'Emergency' trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut makes a hard-hitting impact as Indira Gandhi as the film promises t - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Emergency Trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut's Impact as Indira Gandhi

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Times of India

This article discusses the newly released trailer for the film 'Emergency', where Kangana Ranaut portrays the former Prime Minister of India, Indira Gandhi. The film aims to illuminate the gripping and often untold story of the 1975 emergency in India.

  • The trailer showcases Ranaut's strong performance, promising a hard-hitting narrative.
  • It highlights key events and the political climate during the 1975 emergency.
  • The film intends to raise awareness about historical political struggles in India.
  • It has generated significant buzz and discussion in media and public forums.
“This film will reveal the untold story of a crucial period in Indian history.”

Overall, the trailer has received a positive response, generating anticipation for the film's release and discussions regarding its historical significance.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan faces criticism for her interaction with daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Faces Criticism for Interaction with Daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport

Date: New Year, 2024 Source: Times of India

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, known for her role as a loving mother, faced backlash for her reaction to her daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai airport after their New Year vacation. A viral video captured the incident, igniting mixed responses online.

  • A video surfaced of Aishwarya and Aaradhya at Mumbai airport post-vacation.
  • Aaradhya was seen abruptly jumping, prompting Aishwarya to ask, "Who pushed you?" before pushing her aside.
  • This interaction led to significant criticism regarding Aishwarya's parenting style.
  • Despite criticism, there were supportive comments emphasizing the family's happiness and privacy.
  • Abhishek Bachchan displayed care by escorting Aishwarya and Aaradhya to their car safely.
“Why her daughter is jumping like a kid?”
“She jumps for delight, she is too young and behaves natural. No fuss plz.”

The incident sheds light on the challenges public figures face in their parenting roles, particularly in the public eye, with fans calling for understanding and respect for the family’s privacy.

item.title: 'Chikni Chameli from Meesho': Rasha Thadani's debut item song has fans concerned over her age and sleazy lyrics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rasha Thadani's 'fiery' debut item song from Azaad has failed to land well as the internet expresses concern over her age and Uyi Amma's 'sleazy' lyrics

Date: Jan 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

2025 is believed to be a year for emerging talent in Bollywood, but Rasha Thadani's debut item song, Uyi Amma, has sparked criticism for its lyrics and the age of its performer.

  • Rasha Thadani, daughter of Raveena Tandon, released her first item song from the film Azaad.
  • Critics express concern over her age of 19 and the song's suggestive lyrics.
  • Comments on social media reflect disappointment with the industry allowing young performers to debut in item numbers.
  • Despite mixed reviews on Rasha's performance, many feel an item number was not an appropriate debut.
  • The film Azaad is set to release on January 17.
“Bollywood is going backwards. Letting girls debut at 18/19 years old with cheap item songs…”

This debut raises questions about the appropriateness of content for young artists in the industry as it moves into the new year.

item.title: Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer: Jaideep Ahlawat Goes To Nagaland From "Jamna Paar Thaana" In Search Of Truth - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer: Jaideep Ahlawat Goes To Nagaland From 'Jamna Paar Thaana' In Search Of Truth

Publication Date: Monday afternoon

Source: Amazon Prime Video

The wait for Amazon Prime's star crime thriller Paatal Lok is nearing its end with the release of the new season's trailer. It teases a fresh case set in Nagaland and introduces new faces along with a darker narrative.

  • Jaideep Ahlawat returns as Hathiram Chaudhary, now dealing with a complex case after the murder of the Nagaland Democratic Forum's founder.
  • The storyline involves Hathiram navigating a web of dark truths while his personal life faces turmoil.
  • Hathiram's partner from the previous season, Imran Ansari, is now a high-ranking officer.
  • New character Tillotama Shome joins the police force in this season.
  • The season is set to release on Prime Video on January 17.
“Hathiram Chaudhary wasn't just a character, it became a mirror reflecting the complexities of society and humanity, striking a chord with millions worldwide.” - Jaideep Ahlawat

Season 2 promises to delve deeper into Hathiram's psyche, showcasing darker themes and deeper human complexities.
